full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL MGON DON LNGA'I GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES DPAL MGON DON LNGA'I GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI COD, PA'I DUS KYI THA MA'I RANG CAG SEMS CAN RNAMS LA MI DANG MA MIN RNAMS KYIS GNOD PA BAR CHOD LTAR 'BAB PA'I DUS 'DIR LA RANG GTAN KUN LA PHAN PA DANG, KHYAD PAR RIGS DANG DUS SHIN TU MTHO SHING PHUN SUM TSOGS PA DANG DAM TSIG GTZANG MA RNAMS DPYOD YANGS PA THU SHING YI, GUNG LUNG TE LENG DUNG GI TSE RANG RDO RJE NAN DU ^ BTZUN GZUGS DZNYA NA MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
